item.title: OWASP Top 10
item.description: First talk on 15th February 2023, as a guest lecture on Ethical Hacking and Digital Forensics Presentation: docs.google.com I had the privilege of presenting a talk at SAKEC, Mumbai University, diving deep into the intricate workings of web applications while shedding light on the critical vulnerabilities outlined in the OWASP top 10. Through interactive demonstrations, I explained the underlying mechanics of web applications and elucidated strategies to mitigate these vulnerabilities, empowering the audience with actionable insights to secure their web applications.
